name: A game about Meeseeks, or something philosophical.
name_original: A game about Meeseeks, or something philosophical.
description:
So, I joined two game jams and made one game that fits the criteria of both. Can I do that? It's a game about Mr. Meeseeks, and in true Meeseeks fashion the game is completely pointless. It's existence is nothing but suffering, or some deep liberal arts type philosophical bullshit. Probably don't try to beat it, although it can be beat. All graphics were made in MS Paint, but I did add some effects for spice. 

Fill the pit with an obscene amount of Meeseeks bodies to build a bridge to the other side. The game is not over until you flip the light switch for Rick, or something like that. 

The controls are the arrow keys. 

Music by Fambruhghini , everything else by TheSynan.
